sections.text: Columbia Business School’s MBA is a two‑year, full‑time general management program that develops leaders through an analytical core, extensive electives, and applied learning in New York City.

items: Core courses in leadership, strategy, finance, accounting, and marketing
300+ electives across CBS and Columbia University
Master Classes, Immersion Seminars, and experiential projects
Summer internship between first and second year
sections.text: Students begin with a required core and then select from hundreds of electives, with abundant experiential options and a summer internship.

items: Completion of core and elective credits per CBS policy
Participation in experiential components as offered
sections.text: Degree completion requires the core plus elective credits and adherence to Columbia Business School academic policies.
Graduates enter leadership roles across consulting, finance, technology, and entrepreneurship, leveraging Columbia’s NYC ecosystem and alumni network.
